meanings.sent1: The nonsecret recipe for the cake was shared with everyone.
meanings.sent2: It's no nonsecret that she is a talented singer.
meanings.sent3: The nonsecret treasure map led to a surprising discovery.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a nonsecret beacon of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The nonsecret door revealed a magical world beyond.

meanings.sent1: The nonsecret document was available to the public.
meanings.sent2: The meeting minutes were nonsecret and accessible to all.
meanings.sent3: The nonsecret handshake symbolized their friendship.
meanings.sent4: His nonsecret identity as a superhero amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nonsecret mission was known to all the team members.

meanings.definition: Not intended to be kept private or undisclosed
meanings.sent1: The nonsecret party invitation was sent to everyone in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Her nonsecret plan to travel the world excited her friends.
meanings.sent3: The nonsecret surprise party was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: Their nonsecret relationship was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The nonsecret announcement brought smiles to everyone's faces.
